preface.title: About this Document
preface.para: This document is intended for users who want to use eformsignÂ® (hereafter eformsign).
To understand this guide, users must have an understanding of the following:

listitem.para: Basic knowledge of electronic document systems

preface.para: This guide only contains information needed for using eformsign.
The eformsign user guide consists of a total of 10 chapters.
Descriptions of each are as follows:

listitem.para: Chapter 1: Introduction to eformsign
Provides basic information about eformsign including product overview, basic terms, and use cases.
Chapter 2: Basic Info
Provides an overview of the eformsign dashboard and menus and describes how to manage your account.
Chapter 3: Creating documents
Describes how to create documents in eformsign.
Chapter 4: Introduction to Web Form Designer
Provides an overview of eformsign Web Form Designer and describes how to use its features and components.
Chapter 5: Introduction to Form Builder
Provides and overview of eformsign Form Builder and describes how to use its features and components.
Chapter 6: Creating templates using Web Form Designer
Describes how to configure and manage templates created using Web Form Designer.
Chapter 7: Creating templates using Web Form Builder
Describes how to configure and manage templates created using Form Builder.
Chapter 8: Documents Menus
Describes the eformsign documents menus and how to use them and search for documents.
Chapter 9: Customization
Describes how to create and use custom fields in eformsign as well as describing how to manage notification templates.
Chapter 10: Connecting with External Services
Describes how to store completed documents in cloud storage services as well as storing data in Google Sheets and Office 365's Excel spreadsheets.
